verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass at that time,<WH6256> that Judah<WH3063> went<WH3381> down<WH3381> from his brothers,<WH251> and turned<WH5186> in to a certain<WH376> Adullamite,<WH5726> whose name<WH8034> was Hirah.<WH2437>
And Judah<WH3063> saw<WH7200> there<WH8033> a daughter<WH1323> of a certain<WH376> Canaanite,<WH3669> whose name<WH8034> was Shuah;<WH7770> and he took<WH3947> her, and went<WH935> in to her.
And she conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and he called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Er.<WH6147>
And she conceived<WH2029> again,<WH5750> and bore<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and she called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Onan.<WH209>
And she yet<WH5750> again<WH5750> conceived,<WH3254> and bore<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Shelah:<WH7956> and he was at Chezib,<WH3580> when she bore<WH3205> him.
And Judah<WH3063> took<WH3947> a wife<WH802> for Er<WH6147> his firstborn,<WH1060> whose name<WH8034> was Tamar.<WH8559>
And Er,<WH6147> Judah's<WH3063> firstborn,<WH1060> was wicked<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD;<WH3068> and the LORD<WH3068> slew<WH4191> him.
And Judah<WH3063> said<WH559> to Onan,<WH209> Go<WH935> in to your brother's<WH251> wife,<WH802> and marry<WH2992> her, and raise<WH6965> up seed<WH2233> to your brother.<WH251>

And Onan<WH209> knew<WH3045> that the seed<WH2233> should not be his; and it came<WH1961> to pass, when<WH518> he went<WH935> in to his brother's<WH251> wife,<WH802> that he spilled<WH7843> it on the ground,<WH776> lest<WH1115> that he should give<WH5414> seed<WH2233> to his brother.<WH251>
And the thing which<WH834> he did<WH6213> displeased<WH7489> <WH5869> the LORD:<WH3068> why he slew<WH4191> him also.<WH1571>

Then said<WH559> Judah<WH3063> to Tamar<WH8559> his daughter<WH3618> in law,<WH3618> Remain<WH3427> a widow<WH490> at your father's<WH1> house,<WH1004> till<WH5704> Shelah<WH7956> my son<WH1121> be grown:<WH1431> for he said,<WH559> Lest<WH6435> peradventure he die<WH4191> also,<WH1571> as his brothers<WH251> did. And Tamar<WH8559> went<WH3212> and dwelled<WH3427> in her father's<WH1> house.<WH1004>

And in process<WH7235> of time<WH3117> the daughter<WH1323> of Shuah<WH7770> Judah's<WH3063> wife<WH802> died;<WH4191> and Judah<WH3063> was comforted,<WH5162> and went<WH5927> up to his sheep shearers<WH1494> <WH6629> to Timnath,<WH8553> he and his friend<WH7453> Hirah<WH2437> the Adullamite.<WH5726>
And it was told<WH5046> Tamar,<WH8559> saying,<WH559> Behold<WH2009> your father<WH2524> in law<WH2524> goes<WH5927> up to Timnath<WH8553> to shear<WH1494> his sheep.<WH6629>

And she put<WH5493> her widow's<WH491> garments<WH899> off<WH5921> from her, and covered<WH3680> her with a veil,<WH6809> and wrapped<WH5968> herself, and sat<WH3427> in an open<WH5869> place,<WH6607> which<WH834> is by the way<WH1870> to Timnath;<WH8553> for she saw<WH7200> that Shelah<WH7956> was grown,<WH1431> and she was not given<WH5414> to him to wife.<WH802>
When Judah<WH3063> saw<WH7200> her, he thought<WH2803> her to be an harlot;<WH2181> because<WH3588> she had covered<WH3680> her face.<WH6440>

And he turned<WH5186> to her by the way,<WH1870> and said,<WH559> Go<WH3051> to, I pray<WH4994> you, let me come<WH935> in to you; (for he knew<WH3045> not that she was his daughter<WH3618> in law.<WH3618>) And she said,<WH559> What<WH4100> will you give<WH5414> me, that you may come<WH935> in to me?
And he said,<WH559> I will send<WH7971> you a kid<WH1423> from the flock.<WH6629> And she said,<WH559> Will you give<WH5414> me a pledge,<WH6162> till<WH5704> you send<WH7971> it?

And he said,<WH559> What<WH834> pledge<WH6162> shall I give<WH5414> you? And she said,<WH559> Your signet,<WH2368> and your bracelets,<WH6616> and your staff<WH4294> that is in your hand.<WH3027> And he gave<WH5414> it her, and came<WH935> in to her, and she conceived<WH2029> by him.
And she arose,<WH6965> and went<WH3212> away, and laid<WH5493> by her veil<WH6809> from her, and put<WH3847> on the garments<WH899> of her widowhood.<WH491>

And Judah<WH3063> sent<WH7971> the kid<WH1423> by the hand<WH3027> of his friend<WH7453> the Adullamite,<WH5726> to receive<WH3947> his pledge<WH6162> from the woman's<WH802> hand:<WH3027> but he found<WH4672> her not.

Then he asked<WH7592> the men<WH582> of that place,<WH4725> saying,<WH559> Where<WH346> is the harlot,<WH6948> that was openly<WH5879> by the way<WH1870> side? And they said,<WH559> There was no<WH3808> harlot<WH6948> in this<WH2088> place.

And he returned<WH7725> to Judah,<WH3063> and said,<WH559> I cannot<WH3808> find<WH4672> her; and also<WH1571> the men<WH582> of the place<WH4725> said,<WH559> that there was no<WH3808> harlot<WH6948> in this<WH2088> place.
And Judah<WH3063> said,<WH559> Let her take<WH3947> it to her, lest<WH6435> we be shamed:<WH937> behold,<WH2009> I sent<WH7971> this<WH2088> kid,<WH1423> and you have not found<WH4672> her.

And it came<WH1961> to pass about three<WH7969> months<WH2320> after, that it was told<WH5046> Judah,<WH3063> saying,<WH559> Tamar<WH8559> your daughter<WH3618> in law<WH3618> has played the harlot;<WH2181> and also,<WH1571> behold,<WH2009> she is with child<WH2030> by prostitution.<WH2183> And Judah<WH3063> said,<WH559> Bring<WH3318> her forth,<WH3318> and let her be burnt.<WH8313>

When she was brought<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> she sent<WH7971> to her father<WH2524> in law,<WH2524> saying,<WH559> By the man,<WH376> whose<WH834> these<WH428> are, am I with child:<WH2030> and she said,<WH559> Discern,<WH5234> I pray<WH4994> you, whose<WH834> are these,<WH428> the signet,<WH2858> and bracelets,<WH6616> and staff.<WH4294>

And Judah<WH3063> acknowledged<WH5234> them, and said,<WH559> She has been more righteous<WH6663> than I; because<WH3588> that I gave<WH5414> her not to Shelah<WH7956> my son.<WH1121> And he knew<WH3045> her again<WH3254> no<WH3808> more.<WH5750>
And it came<WH1961> to pass in the time<WH6256> of her travail,<WH3205> that, behold,<WH2009> twins<WH8380> were in her womb.<WH990>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when she travailed,<WH3205> that the one put<WH5414> out his hand:<WH3027> and the midwife<WH3205> took<WH3947> and bound<WH7194> on his hand<WH3027> a scarlet<WH8144> thread, saying,<WH559> This<WH2088> came<WH3318> out first.<WH7223>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, as he drew<WH7725> back<WH7725> his hand,<WH3027> that, behold,<WH2009> his brother<WH251> came<WH3318> out: and she said,<WH559> How<WH4100> have you broken<WH6555> forth?<WH6556> this breach<WH6556> be on you: therefore his name<WH8034> was called<WH7121> Pharez.<WH6557>
And afterward<WH310> came<WH3318> out his brother,<WH251> that had the scarlet<WH8144> thread on his hand:<WH3027> and his name<WH8034> was called<WH7121> Zarah.<WH2226>
